verbs.description: irish [V: spiced] [ARG1: beef] the story goes that my irish ancestors brought this recipe along when they immigrated to the u s it takes nearly a week start to finish but that gives the meat time to become really tenderized and build up layers of flavor —mary shenk dekalb illinois beef
